name: IOU
0:
”Alexa, tell i. o. u. to add Chris”
”Alexa, launch i. o. u.”
”Alexa, start i. o. u. and pay off everything Chris owes Tom”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: i. o. u.
des: IOU allows users to organize and track the amount of money they are owed to others. IOU can keep track of the roommates in a household, along with the debts they owe each other. Creditors and borrowers can ask questions about their IOUs including owe much they owe each other, what they owe each other for, and can tell the skill to pay off their debts.
